definition: (pathology) a faint cloudy spot on the cornea
details:
noun
- (pathology) a faint cloudy spot on the cornea
- an immense cloud of gas, usually hydrogen, and dust in interstellar space
= example: an immense cloud of gas, usually hydrogen, and dust in interstellar space
- cloudiness of the urine
- a medicinal liquid preparation intended for use in an atomizer
